citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A Pomerianian (F, #8) was seen with a wound under her left eye and front left leg. The wounds are through the skin. The
licensee said just before noon, one of the dogs in the exercise pen turned on the Pomeranian and was biting it before they
could be separated. At the time of this afternoon inspection the Attending Veterinarian (AV) had not been contacted about
the wound for treatment guidance or to have it seen. With wounds, it is important to contact the AV promptly for treatment
guidance and to have the affected dog seen by the veterinarian. Ensure that this dog is seen by the attending veterinarian
(or by a licensed veterinarian if AV is unavailable) to ensure it's wounds are cared for per the veterinarian's instructions.
***Licensee now has an appointment with a veterinarian clinic for this dog on 10/17/2024.
***Ensure this dog is seen for her appointment and treated by a licensed veterinarian by the end of Thursday 10/17/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Direct
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A Pomerianian (F, #8) was seen with a wound under her left eye and front left leg. The wounds are through the skin. The 
licensee said just before noon, one of the dogs in the exercise pen turned on the Pomeranian and was biting it before they 
could be separated. At the time of this afternoon inspection the Attending Veterinarian (AV) had not been contacted about 
the wound for treatment guidance or to have it seen. With wounds, it is important to contact the AV promptly for treatment 
guidance and to have the affected dog seen by the veterinarian. Ensure that this dog is seen by the attending veterinarian 
(or by a licensed veterinarian if AV is unavailable) to ensure it's wounds are cared for per the veterinarian's instructions.  
***Licensee now has an appointment with a veterinarian clinic for this dog on 10/17/2024.  
***Ensure this dog is seen for her appointment and treated by a licensed veterinarian by the end of Thursday 10/17/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
